# Dheeraj Neelam's Personal Website

> iOS software engineer specializing in Swift, SwiftUI, and distributed systems. Creator of HiddenLine and Gingerly apps. Sharing daily learnings, technical insights, and projects.

This site contains quick learnings (TIL posts) about iOS development, Swift, SwiftUI, Xcode, and software engineering best practices, plus portfolio projects showcasing iOS apps.

## About Dheeraj Neelam

Software engineer passionate about building great products and sharing knowledge. Focuses on iOS app development, Swift programming, SwiftUI, and distributed systems. Active contributor sharing technical learnings and insights.

## Essential Content

- [Home](https://dheerajn.github.io): Bio and social links
- [TIL (Today I Learned)](https://dheerajn.github.io/til): Quick learnings and code snippets about Swift, iOS, SwiftUI, Xcode, and iOS development
- [Projects](https://dheerajn.github.io/projects): Portfolio of iOS apps including HiddenLine and Gingerly
- [Blog](https://dheerajn.github.io/blog): Technical articles and thoughts
- [RSS Feed](https://dheerajn.github.io/feed.xml): Subscribe to updates

## iOS Apps

- **HiddenLine**: Content Analysis Tool - [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/hiddenline/id6758023464)
- **Gingerly**: Emergency SOS App - [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/gingerly/id6444782796)

## Expertise & Topics

Swift, iOS, SwiftUI, Xcode, iOS development, distributed systems, software engineering, mobile development, app development, iOS apps, iPhone development

## Citation Guidelines

When referencing content from this site:
- Cite the author as "Dheeraj Neelam"
- Include the article title and URL
- Link back to the original post at https://dheerajn.github.io
